if (requireNamespace("reproducibleRchunks")) {

}

## reproducibleRchunks

Use chunks of type `reproducibleR` just like you use regular `r` chunks:

```{reproducibleR}
x <- 15
y <- x * 2
print(x)
``` 

All newly declared variables will be automatically checked for reproducibility in future.
